definition: "universal love", principle advocated by Mozi 墨子[Mo4 zi3], stressing that people should care for everyone equally
double/twice/simultaneous/holding two or more (official) posts at the same time
to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)

sentences.english: He who does good comes to the temple gate, he who loves reaches the shrine.
sentences.chinese: 行善的人來到廟門口，兼愛的人走進大殿堂。

sentences.english: Inner Happiness- Bliss, Ecstasy, Universal Love.
sentences.chinese: 內在的幸福快樂，狂喜，兼愛。

sentences.english: In fact, universal love and caring, are worthy of our cherished ideas.
sentences.chinese: 其實兼愛與仁愛一樣，都是值得我們珍視的思想。

sentences.english: Then Mozi's universal love is just blind talking?
sentences.chinese: 那墨家的兼愛豈不就是騙人騙己嗎？
兼愛是否在祛除自私心？
